Title: How Azure AI is Revolutionizing Supply Chain Forecasting and Inventory
Author: JohnNaguib
Description:
In today’s fast-paced global marketplace, supply chain efficiency can make or break a business. Companies face constant challenges such as demand fluctuations, supplier disruptions, and shifting customer expectations. Traditional forecasting methods—often reliant on historical data and rigid models—are no longer enough. This is where **Azure AI** is stepping in, transforming supply chain forecasting and inventory management with intelligent, adaptive, and real-time solutions.
